text: "Fuck, I'm Lonely" (also released in a censored version as "Lonely") is a song by American singer Lauv featuring English singer Anne-Marie. It was released as a single on August 1, 2019, alongside the trailer for the third season of the Netflix series 13 Reasons Why, whose soundtrack features the song. It is also included on Lauv's debut album, How I'm Feeling. ==Background== Lauv met Anne-Marie after they both performed at the Summertime Ball at Wembley Stadium, London, and called the lyrics "pretty self-explanatory" as well as about "missing someone you used to hook up with" and his "least deep and mysterious song". He made the beat on his laptop in an hour while at an airport, and said the title of the song "came out of nowhere" in a conversation with his friends. Anne-Marie said "I never really like admitting that I miss someone after a break up. So here's a song that does it for me." ==Critical reception== Clash called the song "brutally honest but ultra- infectious" and elaborated that Lauv has "the ability to make the bleakest emotions seem beautiful" as well as a "consistent dichotomy running through his work". i-D felt that the track is "both dangerously catchy and sort of sad when you think about it", describing it a song that "forces you to have a 4am, Sunday morning epiphany as you melt into the sofa at an afterparty". MTV wrote the song is "Sonically and thematically, [...] right in line with Lauv's other recent singles [...] Over a quirky combination of synths, he and Anne-Marie ruminate on their exes and wallow in their loneliness". ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Estonia (Eesti Ekspress) | 31 |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Latvia (LAIPA) | 23 |- ! scope="row"| Lithuania (AGATA) | 16 |- ! scope="row"| Malaysia (RIM) | 16 |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Singapore (RIAS) | 9 |- |- |- ! scope="row"| South Korea (Gaon) | 92 |- |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| US Rolling Stone Top 100 | 98 |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Belgium (Ultratop Flanders) | 91 |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2019 singles Category:2019 songs Category:Lauv songs Category:Anne-Marie (singer) songs Category:Songs written by Lauv Category:Songs written by Michael Pollack
title: Fuck, I'm Lonely
